TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SourceChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class SourceChangedEventArgs Inherits RoutedEventArgs
public ref class SourceChangedEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::RoutedEventArgs

summary.span: 为 SourceChanged 事件提供数据以用于互操作。

span.span: Provides data for the SourceChanged event, used for interoperation.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SourceChanged 事件是其中的事件标识符不公开公开路由的事件。The SourceChanged event is a routed event where the event identifier is not publicly exposed. 这是因为此事件在间的互操作中扮演潜在的严重的一部分，并且不应允许通过任何其他源而不是已知的内部实现任意引发子类 (目前，唯一的这种类是).This is because this event plays a potentially critical part in interoperation and should not be allowed to be raised arbitrarily by any other source than the internal implementation of a known subclass (currently, the only such class is ). 在实现互操作的解决方案时，你可以附加或移除事件处理程序 (通过调用和分别) 但不是能执行通常可用于路由的事件，例如类处理其他操作正在将所有者，添加或引发中的任意元素源的事件。When implementing an interoperation solution, you can attach or remove handlers for the event (by calling and , respectively) but you cannot perform other operations normally available to routed events such as class handling, adding owners, or raising the event from an arbitrary element source. 此类重写虚拟方法，以便返回特定类型的处理程序的事件系统请求。This class overrides the virtual method , in order to return a type-specific handler when requested by the event system. 这替代未在此类成员表中显示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_sdk](~/includes/tla2sharptla-sdk-md.md)]文档因为它是由一个密封类实现的受保护的成员。This override does not appear in the class members table in this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_sdk](~/includes/tla2sharptla-sdk-md.md)] documentation because it is a protected member implemented by a sealed class.
